calc.Розрахунок собівартості пробігу кілометр: Calculation of the cost per mile for
calc.Скільки ви готові проїжджати в місяць: How much are you willing to drive in a month
calc.щоб побачити опис розрахунку: to see a description of the calculation
calc.Розрахунок доходу від співпраці з: Calculation of income from cooperation with
calc.user_info: The data calculated above are indicative and informative only, all possible amounts are determined individually
calc.У таблиці нижче наведені: The table below shows average prices for such a vehicle
calc.Скільки ви зможете заробляти на: How much can you earn on
calc.Перший навігатор для дальнобійників: The first navigator for long-haul drivers
calc.tooltip0: The data calculated below is for demonstration and informational purposes only, all possible amounts are determined individually.
calc.tooltip1: The cost per mile is calculated based on all the data you enter in the table on the left. This is the money you spend to travel one mile.
calc.tooltip2: The revenue from partnering with Cargofy is the total amount you will receive per mile after deducting all the expenses listed in the table.
calc.tooltip3: The revenue from partnering with Cargofy is the total amount you will receive per month after deducting all the expenses listed in the table.
calc.tooltip4: The payback period for the truck is the length of time it takes for you to recover all the money you have spent and continue to spend each month in order to be able to work. After this period, you will only accrue net profit.
calc.tooltip5: This refers to the fixed rate that Cargofy pays for the above truck parameters.

traffic.info: *the price is approximate and may depend on additional conditions. To get an individual calculation, please submit a request for a quote

professional_logistic.title: Professional Logistics
professional_logistic.text: Our dispatchers are self-employed young professionals, retirees, and stay-at-home moms! The only thing that unites them is that they all work remotely from different parts of United States and the world

dispatcher_loads.title: Access to thousands of loads
dispatcher_loads.text: Cargofy is already integrated with most cargo shippers, transportation companies, and freight exchanges. And we can provide access to these loads for you. Leave a request below to find out more

dispatchers.cooperation: What is mutually beneficial cooperation for me?
dispatchers.cooperation_text: Cargofy saves money on creating a workplace and renting an office, buying equipment, while I save on insurance, training, and load boards. As a result, a mutually beneficial cooperation based on win-win principles arises.
dispatchers.map_text: Our dispatchers are self-employed young professionals, retirees, and stay-at-home moms! The only thing that unites them is that they all work remotely from different parts of United States and the world
dispatchers.conditions_text: Earn decent money safely and legally

findlead.title: Out of thousands of requests, we find the one that suits you
findlead.text: Our service is integrated with shippers, which allows us to receive thousands of requests every day. After that, we automatically select the best one for your transport.
